Class CPLProcessingTest

java.lang.Object
CPLProcessingTest
class CPLProcessingTest extends Object
CPLProcessingTest class contains methods for testing the CPLProcessing class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CPLProcessingTest()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) void
    distributeBallots()
    Tests the distributeBallots() method in the CPLProcessing class to check that the ballots are allocated correctly to their respective parties.
    (package private) void
    distributeSeats()
    Tests the distributeSeats() method in the CPLProcessing class to make sure the correct number of seats are allocated to the correct parties.
    (package private) void
    getCandidates()
    Tests the getCandidates() method in the CPLProcessing class to make sure all candidates are extracted and put into a list.
    (package private) void
    getParties()
    Tests the getParties() method in the CPLProcessing class to make sure all parties are extracted and put into a list.
    (package private) void
    processElection()
    Tests the processElection() method in the CPLProcessing class to check that the CPL Election results are correct.This also test processElection() with an election with multiple file ballots.
    (package private) void
    setParties()
    Tests the setParties() method in the CPLProcessing class to make sure a party is created with the correct party name and candidates associated with that party .

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • CPLProcessingTest

      CPLProcessingTest()

  • Method Details

    • distributeSeats

      @Test void distributeSeats() throws IOException
      Tests the distributeSeats() method in the CPLProcessing class to make sure the correct number of seats are allocated to the correct parties. Also tests with multiple file ballots.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO exception occurs when reading from csv file.

    • setParties

      @Test void setParties() throws IOException
      Tests the setParties() method in the CPLProcessing class to make sure a party is created with the correct party name and candidates associated with that party .
      Throws:
      IOException - if an IO error occurs when reading from file

    • distributeBallots

      @Test void distributeBallots() throws IOException
      Tests the distributeBallots() method in the CPLProcessing class to check that the ballots are allocated correctly to their respective parties. This also test distributeBallots() with an election with multiple file ballots.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO exception occurs when reading from csv file.

    • processElection

      @Test void processElection() throws IOException
      Tests the processElection() method in the CPLProcessing class to check that the CPL Election results are correct.This also test processElection() with an election with multiple file ballots.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO exception occurs when reading from csv file.

    • getCandidates

      @Test void getCandidates() throws IOException
      Tests the getCandidates() method in the CPLProcessing class to make sure all candidates are extracted and put into a list. Also test with multiple file ballots.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO exception occurs when reading from csv file.

    • getParties

      @Test void getParties() throws IOException
      Tests the getParties() method in the CPLProcessing class to make sure all parties are extracted and put into a list. Includes test with multiple file ballots.
      Throws:
      IOException - if IO exception occurs when reading from csv file.
